name: SEER Regional Nodes
title: SEER Regional Nodes
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in SEER Mets.

**Note 2:**  Inferior mesenteric nodes are coded as Mets at DX for cecum, ascending colon, transverse colon, and hepatic flexure. Superior mesenteric nodes are coded in SEER Mets.
footnotes:
¥  Considered distant for splenic flexure in Historic stage
\###  Considered distant in Historic stage
